posts.raw_content:
https://patriots.win/p/19Bst2rcSz/prayers-please--biopsies-today/c

Hello friends. I did want to provide an update since I had so much encouragement from my original post about this. The doctor called me this morning and I do have cancer in both breasts. 

I'm waiting for a call to schedule an appt with a surgeon and the pathologist will continue to do more testing to determine the type of cancer. All info will go to an oncologist at some point. I'll discuss treatment options with the oncologist but I'm doing Tippens protocol right now with Ivermectin and FenBen. I'll need surgery bc the tumor in one breast is causing a lot of pain. I have no intention of taking radiation, chemo or immunotherapy.

Right now I'm thinking I'm going to do the surgery, recover from that and then travel to the extent I can until it's time for me to go into hospice. 

I don't know how much I'll be posting on here going forward so I'd like to say to everyone:

I've been on T_D since 2015. I'm proud to be a meme war veteran from the first, second and third meme wars. I'm proud to have stood alongside you all to get Donald Trump elected. I pray he is able to accomplish the necessary actions to bring our country back to the America I grew up in. 

You all must continue to fight against socialism and communism. It's coming. NYC mayor election should be a wake up call for all of us. 

Get married, have children and raise them right for they truly are the future. Govt schools will brainwash your children to be against you and groom them for easier access for pedos. Demand accountability and homeschool if you can. 

Never let them get away with shaming you for speaking the truth by calling you racist, nazi, islamophobe or anything else. It's ok to be proud of yourself, your family and your race. It's ok to be conservative and it's ok to be white. Never, ever let them shame you for these things again. 

Do not forget what they did to Trump. Do not forget the govt is full of pedophiles that want to groom your children. Never forget what they did during covid. Covid was tyranny. 

HRC, Obama, Brennan, Rice, et al are guilty of treason and/or sedition. This cannot be allowed to go unpunished else it will happen again. Our govt will not be cleared until the pedos and traitors are arrested, convicted and punished. 

Hopefully I'll be around in 2027 to vote for Vance but if not I'll have my family monitor my voting record to make sure I don't suddenly start voting democrat. 

For now, I'll say fight, fight, fight. And I will too.
posts.author: ChickNorris
posts.title: Update - biopsies for breast cancer
posts.content:
https://patriots.win/p/19Bst2rcSz/prayers-please--biopsies-today/c

Hello friends. I did want to provide an update since I had so much encouragement from my original post about this. The doctor called me this morning and I do have cancer in both breasts.

I'm waiting for a call to schedule an appt with a surgeon and the pathologist will continue to do more testing to determine the type of cancer. All info will go to an oncologist at some point. I'll discuss treatment options with the oncologist but I'm doing Tippens protocol right now with Ivermectin and FenBen. I'll need surgery bc the tumor in one breast is causing a lot of pain. I have no intention of taking radiation, chemo or immunotherapy.

Right now I'm thinking I'm going to do the surgery, recover from that and then travel to the extent I can until it's time for me to go into hospice.

I don't know how much I'll be posting on here going forward so I'd like to say to everyone:

I've been on T_D since 2015. I'm proud to be a meme war veteran from the first, second and third meme wars. I'm proud to have stood alongside you all to get Donald Trump elected. I pray he is able to accomplish the necessary actions to bring our country back to the America I grew up in.

You all must continue to fight against socialism and communism. It's coming. NYC mayor election should be a wake up call for all of us.

Get married, have children and raise them right for they truly are the future. Govt schools will brainwash your children to be against you and groom them for easier access for pedos. Demand accountability and homeschool if you can.

Never let them get away with shaming you for speaking the truth by calling you racist, nazi, islamophobe or anything else. It's ok to be proud of yourself, your family and your race. It's ok to be conservative and it's ok to be white. Never, ever let them shame you for these things again.

Do not forget what they did to Trump. Do not forget the govt is full of pedophiles that want to groom your children. Never forget what they did during covid. Covid was tyranny.

HRC, Obama, Brennan, Rice, et al are guilty of treason and/or sedition. This cannot be allowed to go unpunished else it will happen again. Our govt will not be cleared until the pedos and traitors are arrested, convicted and punished.

Hopefully I'll be around in 2027 to vote for Vance but if not I'll have my family monitor my voting record to make sure I don't suddenly start voting democrat.

For now, I'll say fight, fight, fight. And I will too.
